title: New: dd elle – Kind 2 U
body:
**dd elle** follow up his/their/her debut track _a note_, with _Kind 2 U_, a slice of squelchy, R&B infused synth pop.

In a similar vein to 2013’s track of the year (possibly) BIPP by elusive producer SOPHIE, there’s elements of recent buzzband Jungle and Ben Khan mixed in, making for a slightly bemusing, yet thoroughly enjoyable concoction.
